data.name: Evolvation
data.detailed_description:
A Game developed by a Two-Man-Army


Created in Amsterdam by Eric Ruts and Jacob Kooijman. Evolvation is a class based and fast paced multiplayer arena space flying shooter.

Class based multiplayer action


With classes like Highspeed, Fighter, Tank, Stealth and Support.

Extensive upgrading system for customized spaceships


Thousands of possible combinations in the Hangar.

Instant multiplayer Action


An arena-like multiplayer space flying shooter which never stops to have action. It is a game which does not require extensive game hours in order to keep up with your friends. But still some amazing perks can be acquired by gaining experience points.

Perfect game to play with Friends


Host or join a game in a split of a second.

Join us at Discord


Join the community to play, help developing or whatever you would like to do. We are establishing a great community with people help translating, making 3D models, composite music, host their own servers etc. Join the discord via the following link:

Play the game


We hope to see you in game. The game is still under heavy development but already fun to play. Feel free to let us know how we can improve the game or contribute via the Discord server.

A Game developed by a Two-Man-Army


Created in Amsterdam by Eric Ruts and Jacob Kooijman. Evolvation is a class based and fast paced multiplayer arena space flying shooter.

data.short_description: Evolvation是一款休闲的多人游戏，快节奏且基于类，是由来自阿姆斯特丹的两人军（Eric和Jacob）开发的太空飞行射击游戏。 类别为：高速，战斗机，隐形，支援和坦克。 每个班级都有自己的特殊能力，可以提供动态的游戏玩法。
data.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 德语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 阿拉伯语*, 捷克语*, 荷兰语*, 波兰语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西*, 罗马尼亚语*, 俄语*, 简体中文*, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲*, 瑞典语*, 繁体中文*, 乌克兰语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统 *: 64-Bit or 32-Bit Windows 7
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD FX-6100, or better
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 显卡: DirectX10 Compatible GPU, NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX 版本: 10
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: It is possible to run the game on lower specs than what is noted as minimum, but we do not recommend it. These minimum specs are of really low graphics quality but it does not affect the gameplay, only the graphics.
pc_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: 64-Bit Windows 10
  • 处理器: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350, or better
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 显卡: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 with 2 GB Video RAM (current equivalent NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760) | AMD Radeon HD 7770 with 2 GB Video RAM, or better
  • DirectX 版本: 11
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: OS X 10.9.2.
  • 处理器: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 显卡: DirectX10 Compatible GPU, NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Or OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 2GB Video RAM
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: It is possible to run the game on lower specs than what is noted as minimum, but we do not recommend it. These minimum specs are of really low graphics quality but it does not affect the gameplay, only the graphics.
mac_requirements.recommended:
推荐配置:
  • 操作系统: OS X 10.11
  • 处理器: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD FX-6100, or better
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 显卡: DirectX10 Compatible GPU, NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Or OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 2GB Video RAM
  • 网络: 宽带互联网连接
  • 存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间

linux_requirements.minimum:
最低配置:
  • 操作系统: Ubuntu Equivalent Distro
  • 处理器: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • 内存: 4 GB RAM
  • 显卡: DirectX10 Compatible GPU, NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher Or OpenGL 3 Compatible GPU with 1GB Video RAM
  • 存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间
  • 附注事项: It is possible to run the game on lower specs than what is noted as minimum, but we do not recommend it. These minimum specs are of really low graphics quality but it does not affect the gameplay, only the graphics.
